title: "prepostsessiondata_filter(pre)"
output: html_document
---
Load necessary packages
```{r}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

Load data
```{r}

```





Filter REDCap data for desired IDs. In this round, 12002 is excluded because the child was TD, and 12009 did not complete the study. 
```{r}
PrePostData <- PrePostData %>%
  filter(Record_ID != "12002" & Record_ID != "12009")
```

Remove missing data
```{r}
PrePostData<- PrePostData %>%
  filter(!is.na(PANAS_Start_Pos),
         !is.na(PANAS_Start_Neg),
         !is.na(IOS_Pre),
         !is.na(PANAS_End_Pos),
         !is.na(PANAS_End_Neg),
         !is.na(IOS_Post))
```

For the first analysis, I will only be using Pre data points.
Filter for only this data. Named _An1 for analysis 1.
```{r}
PreOnlyData_An1 <- PrePostData %>%
  select(Record_ID, Session, PANAS_Start_Pos, PANAS_Start_Neg, IOS_Pre)

as_tibble(PreOnlyData_An1)
```
